aldODBCSqlStringConfig.AccessSql: select e.patientID ,e.examinationNum,e.clinicalNum,e.examineDate, e.examineTime,e.examinationStatus, e.examineDoctor,e.examineType,e.reportDoctorID, e.reportTime,e.examineDepartmentID, e.examineParts,e.feeType,e.fee, e.feeItemName, e.bedNum,e.medicalRecordNum, e.medicalTechnicalNum,e.inHospitalNum, e.hospitalDistrictNum,e.instrumentModel, e.isFirstVisit,e.isPositive,e.intern, e.clinicalDiagnosis,e.majorTell,e.medicalRecords, e.pathlogyNum, e.HP,e.pathlogyDiagnosis, e.samplingExaminePart,e.sentByDepartmentID, e.sentByDoctor, e.examinationUserDefine1, e.examinationUserDefine2, e.examinationUserDefine3, e.examinationUserDefine4, e.examinationUserDefine5, e.examinationUserDefine6, e.examinationUserDefine7, e.examinationUserDefine8, e.reportDate,e.examinationUserDefine9, e.examinationUserDefine10, e.examineApplicationScanImagePath, e.lastMenseDate,e.pregnantTimes, e.procreateTimes,e.pregnantDurationWeeks, e.pregnantDurationDays,e.patientFrom, e.checkDoctorID, e.checkDoctorName,CURRENT_DATE AS 日期, CURRENT_TIME AS 时间, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as 日期时间,t.patientNum,t.patientName, t.patient_UID,t.patientSex,t.patientNation, t.patientAge,t.patientAgeUnit, (t.patientAge+t.patientAgeUnit) as 年龄, t.patientBirthday,t.patientTime, t.patientSurfaceArea,t.patientHeight, t.patientWeight,t.patientTelephone, t.patientAddress,t.patientJob,t.patientUnit, t.patientMarriageStatus,t.patientInsuranceNum, t.patientIdentityCardNum,t.patientPicPath, t.patientUserDefine1, t.patientUserDefine2, t.patientUserDefine3, t.patientUserDefine4, t.patientUserDefine5, t.patientUserDefine6, t.patientUserDefine7, t.patientUserDefine8, t.patientUserDefine9, t.patientUserDefine10 , u.name as ReportDoctor,u.userName as ReportDoctorUserName, dept.departmentname as sendByDepartment from t_examination e inner join t_patient t on e.patientID = t.patientID left join t_user u on u.userID =e.reportDoctorID left join t_department dept on e.sentByDepartmentID=dept.departmentID where e.examinationID=@EXAMINATIONID
